reviewText: over the top melodrama, dated visuals (as opposed to timeless visuals), very bad acting for the most part. generally speaking: over wrought and not deserving of the millions that they must be making (might have made) from it.  hate that  i bought it and did give it one star because i actually watch the entire thing ... feeling that i could not be critical unless i watched it in it's entirety :-(  iiiiiikkkkk >>> an understatement.

This was received in a short time and in excellent condition.  I had ordered the other box set, and I anxiously awaited this one.  I was not disappointed.  I can't speak to highly of the quality of Amazon merchandise.  I recommend them and the purchases highly.
Sincerely, Gwendolyn Tavares

We enjoyed these films.  They are typical Barbara T. Bradford love stories, but very enjoyable to watch.  Particularly enjoyed seeing James Brolin, Virginia Tennat, and Elizabeth Hurley as they were in l989.

I WAS PLEASED WITH THE QUICK SERVICE I RECEIVED FROM AMAZON.COM WHEN I PLACED THIS ORDER.I HAVE NOT HAD A CHANCE TO REVIEW THIS DVD MOVIE SET BUT IF ITS ANYTHING TO DO WITH BARBARA TAYLOR BRADFORD IT WILL BE TOP NOTCH.THANK YOU FOR ASKING MY OPINION.I DEFINITELY WILL SURE AMAZON.COM AGAIN IN THE FUTURE.
